=== Purchase Information === Product Title: MRTREUP Chrome Nail Powder Palette , Metallic Mirror Effect Chrome Powder for Nails , Rose Gold Sliver Pink Holographic Nail Glitter Nail Pigment Powder for DIY Salon Nail Art Decorations Review Date: 2022/07/28 Store: MRTREUP Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '5.59 x 2.05 x 0.55 inches; 1.76 Ounces'} Review Text: I didn’t know what to expect from this product but I must say it really does deliver a cool chrome effect that can be incorporated with your nail design. It’s at a great price and has a variety of colors you can choose from. Overall I’m very happy with the purchase!

Thank you for taking the time to read my review and photos of this product.  I hope it has been helpful in providing you with more information. Review Title: Cool Chrome Effects On Nails Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

Five Stars OULAC Shine to Shine Moisture Shine Lipstick, Glossy Finish, Vegan Friendly, 2.2 grams / 0.07 ounces, # (09) Oulac {'Brand': 'Oulac', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Stick', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Product Benefits': 'Nourishing,Moisturizing', 'Product Dimensions': '3.84 x 0.59 x 0.59 inches; 1.23 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'moistureshine-lipstick-09'} This lipstick goes on sheer and very shiny, but the color still shows vibrant. I also like that it moisturizes your lips.

Thank you for taking the time to read my review and photos of this product. I hope it has been helpful in providing you with more information. Sheer and Shiny Lipstick 21Pcs Dip Powder Nail Kit - Aubss 10 Colors Dip Nail Kit, Neutral Skin Tone Dipping Powder Colors Kit, Dip Powder for French Nail Art Nail Manicure Kit Salon DIY Home, No Nail Lamp Needed AUBSS {'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'AUBSS', 'Included Components': 'Dip Powder', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Product Dimensions': '8.94 x 8.23 x 1.73 inches; 1.29 Pounds'} This dip power set is a great idea for gifting this holiday season. It comes with everything you’d need to learn how to use dip powder, even brings cuticle oil! The blue set brings a nice variety of colors, from pink to blue and some glittery one too. Highly recommended!

Thank you for taking the time to read my review and photos of this product. I hope it has been helpful in providing you with more information. Nice Starter Kit Veda Tinda Gel Nail Polish Kit 20 Colors Fall Winter Modern Stage Soak off UV/LED Lamp Nail Polish Set with Glossy & Matte Top Coat and Base Coat Christmas veda Tinda {'Brand': 'veda Tinda', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'base', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy, Matte', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Unit Count': '3.50 Fl Oz', 'Liquid Volume': '0.25 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '10.63 x 3.98 x 3.94 inches; 1.81 Pounds'} This set brings a great selection of colors that work well for special occasions since it has neutral pinks, mauve, burgundies, blues and many shades of grays/silver. It’s my go-to set for when I need to glam up for a wedding or nighttime party.

Thank you for taking the time to read my review and photos of this product. I hope it has been helpful in providing you with more information. Glamorous Nail Colors Aubss 20Pcs Colors Gel Nail Polish Kit with Glossy & Matte Top Coat and 2Pcs Base Coat, Rainbow Colors Skin Tones Yellow Red Gel Polish for All Reason, Gel Nail Kit for Women Girls Christmas Gift AUBSS {'Brand': 'AUBSS', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Color': '003', 'Type': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Matte,Glossy', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '25', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '7.87 x 5.51 x 2.76 inches', 'Product Dimensions': '7.87 x 5.51 x 2.76 inches; 2.08 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'AUBSS'} This gel nail polish set contains a great selection of 20 colors, and includes the base and glossy & matte top coats. I used the red polish on my toenails and so far they have lasted over 2 weeks without issues. However (at least with the red polish), the color goes on a bit transparent so you would definitely need 2 coats of color. Overall, it’s highly recommended!

Thank you for taking the time to read my review and photos of this product.  I hope it has been helpful in providing you with more information. Affordable Selection of Gel Colors AIFAIFA 9Pcs Gel Nail Polish Set, Burgundy Nail Polish Kits Red Colors Soak Off UV/LED Nail Polish Set, Gel Polish with Base Coat & Glossy & Matte Top All-Season Salon Manicure Art Design Red AIFAIFA {'Brand': 'AIFAIFA', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Color': 'Burgundy,Red', 'Type': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy, Matte', 'Special Feature': 'Long Lasting', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic', 'Unit Count': '9.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '9', 'Package Dimensions': '7.99 x 4.21 x 2.83 inches; 11.99 Ounces'} This small set is perfect to add more shades of reds to your collection of gel polishes. Two coats and the color looks rich and vibrant. I also appreciate that it comes with glossy and matte top coats to change it up. I cure the base, color and top coats for 60 seconds each in my UV/LED lamp and it’s lasted for a week without chipping.

Thank you for taking the time to read my review and photos of this product.  I hope it has been helpful in providing you with more information. Great Selection of Reds Solflower SPF 30 Sunscreen Lotion - Broad Spectrum, UVA/UVB Protection - PABA-Free, Oil-Free - 3.36 Fl Oz Solflower {'Scent': 'Aloe Vera', 'Sun Protection Factor': '30 Sun Protection Factor (SPF)', 'Unit Count': '3.36 Fl Oz', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Solflower', 'Package Dimensions': '5.08 x 1.93 x 1.89 inches; 5.93 Ounces', 'Item model number': '860006763404', 'UPC': '860006763404'} I use this sunscreen when I go out walking during my 1.5 hour exercise routine and it is sweat resistant and oil free. The product works well and has protected my face from a rosacea outbreak.

Oil Free Sunscreen Vegan Mia - USDA Organic Radiance Superfruit Cleansing Oil and Make-up Remover, Oil Cleanser and Makeup Remover Oil for Dry Skin and Other Skin Types, Loaded with Moisturizer Essential Fatty Acids, Rich in Antioxidants, Truly Natural Skincare, (With No Added Fragrance) 3.4 fl oz Vegan Mia {'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Vegan Mia', 'Scent': 'Natural aroma of fruit oils - No fragrance added', 'Material Feature': 'Natural, Cruelty Free, Vegan', 'Package Dimensions': '6.34 x 1.77 x 1.73 inches; 9.14 Ounces', 'UPC': '762530483363', 'Manufacturer': 'Vegan Mia'} This Vegan, Superfruit oil works well as a makeup remover and also helps hydrate my dry skin. Lately I’ve been using superfruit oils and I’ve found they keep my skin moisturized longer than using other serums.  It is pricey compared to other products in the market but the natural ingredients may be worth the extra money!

Thank you for taking the time to read my review and photos of this product. I hope it has been helpful in providing you with more information. Builder Gel Nail Kit -2 oz Clear&Pink Nail Extension Gel Big Capacity Builder Gel for Nails,Hard Gel Strengthen Set with Nail Forms Brush Nail File DIY for Nail Art Manicure Hzmirzk {'Brand': 'Hzmirzk', 'Included Components': 'Nail File', 'Item Weight': '60 Grams', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Package Dimensions': '7.17 x 3.27 x 2.92 inches; 2.12 Ounces', 'UPC': '779712404368'} This hard gel/poly gel is great to use, especially when I don’t want to use duo forms. Lately I’ve been attaching shaped nail tips (like coffin or stilettos) and just adding hard gel over them instead of acrylic. This product has worked well for that purpose because it allows you to manipulate and shape the gel adequately over the tips at your own pace. Good buy!

profile:
User Summary:

The user continues to cultivate their personal care collection with a strong emphasis on effective sun protection and multifunctional items that align with their holistic beauty approach. Their commitment to natural, eco-conscious, and cruelty-free products rich in nourishing ingredients reflects a dedication to sustainability.

Recently, the user has further embraced creative self-expression through nail art, showcasing a preference for versatile items that elevate their personal style. Their positive experiences with highly-rated nail products influence their purchasing trends, ensuring alignment with their established values of quality and mindful consumption. 

The user has recently expanded their nail art collection with innovative products that deliver impressive effects, reinforcing their trend toward creativity in design. Valuing products that are both functional and aesthetically pleasing, they prioritize options that facilitate unique self-expression while maintaining high ethical standards.

Their emphasis on innovative solutions remains evident in their choices, balancing practicality, performance, and sustainability. As they explore new additions to their collection, they focus on hydrating and nourishing products that align with their impact-driven approach to beauty, ensuring that selections reflect quality and ethical integrity. Overall, the user seeks user-friendly solutions for both everyday and special occasions, while engaging deeply with the evolving world of beauty and self-expression. Their community-oriented mindset is reflected in their penchant for sharing effective beauty experiences and gifting supportive products, further amplifying their dedication to self-care.
